statements: DELETE FROM attendee_preferences WHERE age = 30 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM attendee_preferences WHERE attendee_id = 1 AND age > 30
DELETE FROM attendee_preferences WHERE gender = 'Female' AND interests LIKE '%Technology%'
DELETE FROM EventPreferences WHERE preference_score < 5 OR attendee_id = '987e6543-21b8-3d12-a456-426614174009';
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE attendee_id = '567e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND food_preference = 'Vegetarian';
DELETE FROM event_attendees WHERE event_id = 100 AND attendee_id = 50;
DELETE FROM event_attendees WHERE event_id = 1 AND attendee_id = 5;
DELETE FROM attendees WHERE age < 18 OR gender = 'Other';
